name: Into The Depths (Jason Wilson)
description:
Into The Depths

How far can you descend into the underwater caverns? Avoid fiendish creatures and find sunken treasure in the many branching caverns. Ascend to the surface to buy new equipment and weapons.

Controls

Move Left - Left Arrow or A

Move Right - Right Arrow or D

Jump - Space

Fire Spear Gun - Ctrl

Select - Enter

Cancel - Esc

Quit - Esc
